titleStmt.title: A comedy or enterlude intituled, Inough is as good as a feast very fruteful, godly and ful of pleasant mirth. Compiled by W. Wager. Seuen may easely play this enterlude. The names of the players. ...
Enough is as good as a feast
titleStmt.author: Wager, W. (William)

publicationStmt.publisher: At the long shop adioyning vnto S. Mildreds Church in the Pultrie, by Iohn Allde,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Inough is as good as a feast.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
